permissions: Authenticated user; scope limited to incidents visible via IncidentPolicy scope.
validation_notes: --incident cannot be combined with --incident-type or --incident-id; --incident-id requires --incident-type; --incident expects Type|ID format (example: production-incidents|123); --is-triaged expects true/false.

flags.name: --incident
flags.validation: Cannot be combined with --incident-type or --incident-id; format Type|ID (example: production-incidents|123).

flags.name: --incident-type
flags.validation: Use with --incident-id to filter a specific incident (example: production-incidents).

flags.name: --is-triaged
flags.validation: Value must be true or false.
